column5: This MSc programme is ideal if you wish to gain advanced skills for a professional career in the public, intergovernmental or private sector.Â It also provides a foundation to pursue a PhD in economics.You will acquire detailed knowledge of the most recent research in the disciplines of economics. You will also develop the skills needed to make your own contributions to research.We also offer the following economics courses:Behavioural and Experimental Economics MScEconomics and Data Science MScEconomics and Finance MScWhat you'll learnGain advanced skills in economic theory. You'll also learn quantitative methods in econometrics and mathematical economics.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
